1. Navigate to the `recipes` repository using the command line.
1. Create a new branch called `feature/stash-exercise`.
1. Switch to the new branch.
1. Make any change to any of the files in your project directory.
1. Stash your changes without adding a message.
1. Verify that your working directory is clean.
1. Apply the stash to your working directory.
1. Verify that your changes are restored.
